author: UnionLeader.com
title: Weather | unionleader.com
text: FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. — Inside the emergency room at her Margate hospital, Dr. Paige Swalley orders intravenous fluids for her third patient who arrived dehydrated and suffering from a heat-related illness. Friday, May 31, 2024 It’s been 2½ weeks since a once-in-a-generation display of auroras, or northern and southern lights, visited both the Northern and Southern Hemispheres. Shimmering lights danced as far south as Jamaica, Mexico, India, South Africa and Australia. Monday, May 27, 2024 HAMPTON — Joe and Keri Gurtler are still trying to clean up and dry out their beach house, four months after it was waterlogged by widespread flooding. US, toll could pass 2,000 • A2 Severe tornado-spawning storms tore through the south-central United States overnight Saturday, leaving several people dead and authorities looking for more victims.
